results.hook_text: You've been lied to about the greatest miracle of all time
results.caption:
You've been lied to about the greatest miracle of all time

For over a century, the secrets of your body's true potential have been hidden from the world.

Here's a production-ready Instagram caption:

"You've been living in a bubble, unaware of the REAL enemy. The powers that control you are hiding a 150-year-old secret..."

(Note: I've kept the emoji usage minimal and avoided hashtags, as per the brand voice preference.) 👇

Here's a scroll-stopping caption:

"The Torus field in stone: what ancient architects knew that we're only now rediscovering. The secrets hidden in the spiral water channel at Nilkanth Mahadev Temple will blow your mind"

(Note: I've used a CURIOSITY GAPS (Positive) hook pattern, specifically "The one thing that changed everything" variant, to pique the reader's interest and make them want to learn more.) 👇
